before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmah4","text":"Transfer OCT blocks to OHSU Knight Histopathology Shared Resource (HSR) for sectioning and processing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9qajo","text":"This protocol describes the procedure by which the OMS Atlas serially sections an OCT block, prepares the resulting slides and samples, and then distributes the specimens for downstream analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"39d23","text":"Verify the identity of the OCT block to be cut against written request for sectioning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0df2","text":"Remove OCT block from   freezer and acclimate to cryostat (  ) for minimum of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8ilqa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B5B76810521811EA8056410C27054C6D","id":"50104","label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BF3C3C30521811EA8056410C27054C6D","id":"50105","label":"","temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"96D585D0521811EA8056410C27054C6D","id":"80915","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74t7s","text":"Label all slides and cryotubes with a unique BEMS ID and Part#, corresponding to the written request and OCT spatial map {"blocks":[{"key":"c51bj","text":"Prepare PEN membrane slides by exposing close (~15-20cm) to a UV source for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fl965","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"2B3FB11052A411EAB3AAC7DE60A68DDA","id":"80916","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m191","text":"Orient and face block to get adequate amount of core.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85msh","text":"Note: Avoid excessive facing to reduce tissue loss.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68kt1","text":"Set cryostat to 5 micron sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d5ro4","text":"Note: All sections cut from here on should be sequential. The serial order, adjacency, and consistent orientation of the sections are all important factors. Please note any deviations from the protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":202}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"565qg","text":"Cut first four sections at 5 microns (Part#1-4) and affix onto appropriately labeled slide according to OCT spatial map (step #3 above).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23k6l","text":"Cut one section (Part#5) and place in a cryotube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dsnh7","text":"Note: This is an intermediate section generated when the Cryostat is switching thicknesses. The actual thickness of this section should be about 7µm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":149}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47u2m","text":"Cut two sections (Part#6, 7) and place on appropriate membrane slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8io74","text":"Cut 2 sections (Part#8) and place both sections in a single cryotube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hi9m","text":"Place all slides, both cryotubes, and remaining OCT block in   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5u9ik","text":"Note: No slides are to be fixed under this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":52}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7miff","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DD1CEF30522511EA8056410C27054C6D","id":"50106","label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar9h","text":"Perform hematoxylin and eosin (H\u0026E) staining on slide labeled Part#2 (see OCT spatial map in step #3 above).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brh7p","text":"Deliver unstained slides (Part#1, 3, 4, 6, 7), cryotubes (Part#5, 8), and remainder OCT block (Part#9) to BioLibrary for distribution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cu70c","text":"Note: Keep samples frozen at all times. Store at  . Transfer/ship on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":49},{"style":"italic","offset":50,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fktho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"275F7C00522811EA8056410C27054C6D","id":"50107","label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

title: OMS Atlas OCT Spatial Mapping
